import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-about-site', templateUrl: './about-site.component.html', styleUrls: ['./about-site.component.css'] }) export class AboutSiteComponent { }

About Us

Our website aims to provide assistance to specialists in the fields of software

The site consists of two parts:

Users can ask their questions and they are answered by specialists

Users can request paid services
